metadata.name: Turtle Friends #1/33
metadata.description:
Turtle Friends - Who doesn't love some turtle action. There is a lot of wonderful memories to share from this tiny island called Guraidhoo in Maldives. I spend a lot of time diving and shooting on these colourful reefs of Guraidhoo.

While I was there, I had a number of beautiful encounters with these turtles in their natural habitat. In one of the frame, it's a young Hawksbill turtles who help keep reefs healthy by feeding primarily on sponges that out-compete corals. Another fun fact about them, female hawksbills return to the same nesting grounds where they were born to lay their eggs. How cool is that !

You can also see a giant green sea turtle resting near a cave entrance. It was a dive site called Kandoma. I still remember every second I spend with all those friendly creatures just like yesterday.    

Edition Size: 33

Artist: Shinto | FloodedCamera ([@5hint0](https://twitter.com/5hint0))

Music: Ivaavi ([@ivaavimusic](https://twitter.com/ivaavimusic))

Location & Year Taken : Guraidhoo, Maldives (2018)
